## About me

</div>

I'm a northeastern Brazilian MsC student on Condensed Matter Physics at Federal University of Alagoas. My research is focused in computational simulation of neuronal models and synchronization phenomena. I have more affinity with `C` programming language,however sometimes using `python` or `fortran`.
